TopicTitle: How to install mods from curse on Mac?

Articles.Content:
Hi

So I have installed KSP on my mac today and the first thing I did was to add some mods. But now I have the issue of not knowing how to put my mods into the KSP mac folder. I checked out anything on Steam (where I bought the game) but I can't find anything.

Please help I really need some mods in my game (kind of why I play the game).

Almost all mods are the same.  They contain a folder called GameData.  Inside that folder you will see a folder that is usually named for the mod or mod author.  Simply overwrite the GameData folder with the contents of fhe archive you downloaded and extracted.

 

The end result should be kspgamefolder/gamedata/mod

Hope that helps.  It really is not difficult.
